alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Polk County through 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Haines City, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Haines City, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Jan Phyl Village, Combee Settlement, Lake Alfred, Dundee, Davenport, Polk City, Lake Hamilton, Inwood, Winter Haven Airport, Gibsonia, Winston, Crystal Lake, Cypress Gardens and Kathleen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
